demo.name: brd4338a.demo.wireless_test_soc
demo.label: Wireless Test (SoC)
demo.description: The Wireless Test application is a command-line interface (CLI) application designed to showcase various functionalities and capabilities of SiWx91x in different scenarios and configuration modes. It serves as a quick reference guide and a hands-on demonstration of SiWx91x core features for developers and users.

property.value: Device\ Type|SoC Wireless\ Technology|Wi-Fi Project\ Difficulty|Beginner

demo.name: brd2605a.demo.out_of_box_demo
demo.label: Out of Box Demo (SoC)
demo.description: This application demonstrates the WLAN, BLE, MCU peripheral features and NWP (network processor) powersave capabilities of SiWG917 with a ready to go, minimal software installation experience.

property.value: Device\ Type|SoC Wireless\ Technology|Wi-Fi Wireless\ Technology|Bluetooth Project\ Difficulty|Intermediate
